```{r Grandient descent}
X<- matrix(c(rep(1,nrow(data)),data[,1]),ncol=2)
theta <- rep(0,2)
iterations <- 1500
alpha <- 0.01
computeCost(X,y,theta)
```

```{r fun computeCost}
computeCost <- function(X,y,theta){

  m <- length(y);
  predictions <- X%*%theta;
  sqrErrors <- (predictions - y)^2;
  
  J <- 1.0/(2*m)*sum(sqrErrors);
  return(J)
}
```
